text: kya vah nahin jaanate ki unase pahale hamane kitanee jaatiyon ka naash kar diya, jinhen hamane dharatee mein aisee shakti aur adhikaar diya tha, jo adhikaar aur shakti tumhen nahin diye hain aur hamane unapar dhaara pravaah varsha kee aur unakee dharatee mein naharen pravaahit kar deen, phir hamane unake paapon ke kaaran unhen naash[1] kar diya aur unake pashchaat doosaree jaatiyon ko paida kar diya
